anya-e0104n0:5_1: āha. “Abhiññā sampādetuṁ yogo kātabbo”ti vatvā tattha payojanavisese dassetuṁ “evañhī”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:5_2: vuttaṁ. Kiñcāpi thiratarabhāvo, vipassanābhāvanāsukhatā ca samādhibhāvanāya ānisaṁso
anya-e0104n0:5_3: eva, tathāpi pañca lokiyābhiññā yathāvuttasamādhibhāvanāya ānisaṁsabhāvena pākaṭā
anya-e0104n0:5_4: paññātāti tāsaṁyeva vasena yogino adhigatānisaṁsatā vuttā, cuddasadhā cittaparidamanena
anya-e0104n0:5_5: thirataratā vuttā. Lokiyābhiññāsu vasībhāvopi samādhisseva vasībhāvo, tathā ca “samāhito
anya-e0104n0:5_6: yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī”ti vacanato “sukheneva paññābhāvanaṁ sampādessatī”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:5_7: Tasmāti yasmā samādhibhāvanāya ānisaṁsalābho thirataratā, sukheneva ca paññābhāvanā
anya-e0104n0:5_8: ijjhati, tasmā abhiññākathaṁ tāva ārabhissāma, paññābhāvanāya okāse sampattepīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:6_0: Bhagavatā pañca lokikābhiññā vuttāti sambandho. Na catukkajjhānamattameva idha sāsane
anya-e0104n0:6_1: sampādetabbaṁ, napi iddhividhañāṇameva, atha kho aññampi atthīti uttaruttaripaṇītapaṇītadhammadesanatthañca.
anya-e0104n0:7_0: Iddhivikubbananti iddhisaṅkhātaṁ pakativaṇṇajahanakiriyaṁ, idaṁ iddhīsu vikubbaniddhiyā
anya-e0104n0:7_1: padhānatāya vuttaṁ, iddhiṁ vikubbanañcāti evaṁ vā attho daṭṭhabbo. Vikubbanassa visuṁ
anya-e0104n0:7_2: gahaṇampi vuttakāraṇeneva daṭṭhabbaṁ. Ākāsakasiṇavasena arūpasamāpattiyo na sambhavanti,
anya-e0104n0:7_4: adhippetattā, ākāsanimmānādiatthaṁ pana tadubhayampi icchitabbameva. Aṭṭha aṭṭhāti
anya-e0104n0:7_5: yathāvuttesu kasiṇesu ekekasmiṁ aṭṭha aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Kasiṇānulomatoti kasiṇapaṭipāṭito,
anya-e0104n0:7_6: paṭipāṭi ca desanāvasena veditabbā. Jhānānulomo pana paṭipattivasenapi. Ukkamanaṁ
anya-e0104n0:7_7: ukkantaṁ, ukkantameva ukkantikaṁ, jhānassa ukkantikaṁ jhānukkantikaṁ, tato, jhānalaṅghanatoti
anya-e0104n0:7_8: attho. Aṅgasaṅkantito aṅgātikkamato. Cittaṁ paridametabbaṁ yadicchakaṁ yatthicchakaṁ
anya-e0104n0:7_9: jhānānaṁ samāpajjanādisukhatthaṁ, tesaṁ ārammaṇānañca sallakkhaṇatthaṁ. Evañhissa
anya-e0104n0:8_0: 366.Jhānaṁ samāpajjatīti kiṁ catubbidhampi jhānaṁ samāpajjati, udāhu ekekanti? Kiñcettha
anya-e0104n0:8_1: yadi catubbidhampi samāpajjati, aṅgasaṅkantito viseso na siyā, atha ekekaṁ ārammaṇasaṅkantito.
anya-e0104n0:8_2: Nāyaṁ doso ābhogavasena tesaṁ visesasiddhito. Yadā hi kasiṇānulomameva ābhujitvā
anya-e0104n0:8_3: tattha tattha kasiṇe jhānāni samāpajjati, na aṅgasaṅkantiṁ, tadā kasiṇānulomo. Yadā
anya-e0104n0:8_4: pana aṅgasaṅkantiṁ ābhujitvā jhānāni samāpajjati, tadā aṅgasaṅkanti veditabbā. Iminā
anya-e0104n0:8_5: nayena kasiṇānulomaārammaṇasaṅkantiādīnampi aññamaññaṁ viseso veditabbo. Idaṁ kasiṇānulomaṁ
anya-e0104n0:9_0: Tathevāti “paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu satakkhattumpi sahassakkhattumpī”ti etassa
anya-e0104n0:9_1: upasaṁhārattho tathā-saddo. Paṭilomato cettha paṭipāṭi. Tenāha “paṭilomakkamenā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:9_2: Ayañhettha attho – paṭhamaṁ odātakasiṇe jhānaṁ samāpajjati, tato lohitakasiṇeti yāva
anya-e0104n0:11_0: Tatthevāti pathavīkasiṇeyeva. Tatoti pacchā tatiyajjhānato vuṭṭhānantarakālaṁ. Tadevāti
anya-e0104n0:11_1: pathavīkasiṇameva. Tato ākiñcaññāyatananti tato pathavīkasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattitaākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattito
anya-e0104n0:11_2: vuṭṭhāya viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ amanasikaritvā taṁ laṅghitvā yathāvuttaākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇassa
anya-e0104n0:11_4: pathavīkasiṇapakkhikameva hotīti vuttaṁ “kasiṇaṁ anukkamitvā”ti. Atha vā aṭṭhasu
anya-e0104n0:11_5: kasiṇesu kassaci ukkamanaṁ idha kasiṇukkantikaṁ nāmāti āha “kasiṇaṁ anukkamitvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:11_6: Jhānukkantikanti ettha icchitaṁ avadhāraṇena nivattetabbaṁ, ukkamanassa ca sarūpaṁ
anya-e0104n0:11_7: dassetuṁ “evaṁ kasiṇa”ntiādiṁ vatvā puna taṁ pakāraṁ saha nissayena sesakasiṇesu
anya-e0104n0:11_8: atidisanto “evaṁ āpokasiṇādi…pe… kātabbā”ti āha. Tenāha “iminā nayenā”tiādi. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:11_9: paṭhamajjhānamūlakaṁ pathavīkasiṇādīsu jhānukkantikaṁ dassitaṁ, evaṁ dutiyajjhānādimūlakampi
anya-e0104n0:12: Tadevāti paṭhamajjhānameva. Kasiṇukkantikepi āpokasiṇādimūlikā yojanā vuttanayeneva kātabbā, tathā yathārahaṁ dutiyajjhānādimūlikā.
anya-e0104n0:13_0: Lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatananti lohitakasiṇaṁ āvajjento abhimukhaṁ katvā tassa
anya-e0104n0:13_1: ugghāṭanena upaṭṭhite kasiṇugghāṭimākāse amanasikārena ākāsānañcāyatanajjhānaṁ samāpajjitvā
anya-e0104n0:13_2: tattha pubbe pavattaviññāṇassa apagamaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samāpajjati.
anya-e0104n0:14_0: Itaresanti avasiṭṭharūpāvacarajjhānānaṁ. Na hi arūpajjhānesu aṅgasaṅkanti atthi,
anya-e0104n0:14_1: nāpi tāni pathavīkasiṇe pavattanti. Yaṁ pana aṅgārammaṇasaṅkantivacane “nīlakasiṇaṁ
anya-e0104n0:14_2: ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatana”ntiādi vuttaṁ, taṁ yathālābhavasena vuttaṁ, pariyāyena
anya-e0104n0:14_3: vāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Nippariyāyato pana yathā aṅgasaṅkanti rūpajjhānesu eva labbhati,
anya-e0104n0:14_4: evaṁ arūpajjhānesu eva ārammaṇasaṅkanti. Tassa tasseva hi jhānassa ārammaṇantare
anya-e0104n0:14_5: pavatti ārammaṇasaṅkanti. Tenāha “sabbakasiṇesu ekasseva jhānassa samāpajjanaṁ ārammaṇasaṅkantikaṁ nāmā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:15_0: Yathā pana “sabbakasiṇesū”ti iminā ākāsaviññāṇakasiṇānampi saṅgaho hotīti na sakkā
anya-e0104n0:15_1: vattuṁ idha aṭṭhannaṁyeva kasiṇānaṁ adhigatattā, evaṁ sabbampi arūpajjhānaṁ “ekaṁ
anya-e0104n0:15_2: jhāna”nti na sakkā vattuṁ aṭṭhannaṁ samāpattīnaṁ vasena cittaparidamanassa icchitattā.
anya-e0104n0:15_3: Tasmā āruppajjhānānaṁ vasena aṅgārammaṇasaṅkanti pariyāyena vuttāti veditabbaṁ. Tathā
anya-e0104n0:15_4: hi pītakasiṇugghāṭimākāse yaṁ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṁ, tadārammaṇaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ
anya-e0104n0:15_5: sandhāyāha “pītakasiṇato viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samāpajjitvā”ti. Iminā nayena sesadvayepi
anya-e0104n0:15_6: attho veditabbo. Ekantarikavasenāti aññattho antara-saddo. Antarameva antarikaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:15_7: ekajjhaṁ antarikaṁ etasminti ekantarikaṁ, jhānasamāpajjanaṁ, tassa vasena. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:15_8: aṅgānaṁ, ārammaṇassa ca ekajjhaṁ aññathā viseso hoti, tathā samāpajjanavasenāti.
anya-e0104n0:15_9: So pana viseso heṭṭhimānaṁ tesaṁ aṅgārammaṇānaṁ samatikkamanavasena hotīti vuttaṁ
anya-e0104n0:15_11: aṅgesu, “idaṁ pathavīkasiṇa”ntiādinā ārammaṇesu ca vavatthāpitesu ekajjhaṁ tesaṁ
anya-e0104n0:15_12: vavatthāpane na koci viseso atthīti aṭṭhakathāsu ayaṁ vidhi nābhato. Evañca katvā
anya-e0104n0:15_13: jhānukkantikādīsu paṭilomakkamena, anulomapaṭilomakkamena ca ekantarikabhāvena labbhamānampi
anya-e0104n0:15_14: jhānādīnaṁ ukkamanaṁ na uddhaṭaṁ, tehi nayehi vināpi cittaparidamanaṁ ijjhatīti papañcaparihāratthaṁ
anya-e0104n0:16_1: Ādibhūtaṁ yogakammaṁ ādikammaṁ, taṁ etassa atthīti ādikammiko, pubbe akataparicayo
anya-e0104n0:16_2: bhāvanaṁ anuyuñjanto. Tenāha “yogāvacaro”ti. Kasiṇaparikammampi bhāroti dosavivajjanādividhinā
anya-e0104n0:16_3: kasiṇamaṇḍale paṭipatti yāva uggahanimittuppatti kasiṇaparikammaṁ, tampi nāma bhāro,
anya-e0104n0:16_4: pageva iddhivikubbanāti adhippāyo. Nimittuppādananti paṭibhāganimittuppādanaṁ. Taṁ
anya-e0104n0:16_5: vaḍḍhetvāti taṁ nimittaṁ, bhāvanañca vaḍḍhetvā. Na hi bhāvanāya vināva nimittavaḍḍhanaṁ
anya-e0104n0:16_6: labbhati. Keci upacārasamādhiṁ labhitvā appanāsamādhiṁ adhigantuṁ na sakkonti, tādisāpi
anya-e0104n0:16_7: bahū hontevāti āha “appanādhigamo bhāro”ti. Appanādhigamoti vā aṭṭhannaṁ samāpattīnaṁ
anya-e0104n0:16_8: adhigamamāha. Aññova samāpattīnaṁ upanissayo, añño abhiññānanti āha “paridamitacittassāpi
anya-e0104n0:16_9: iddhivikubbanaṁ nāma bhāro”ti. Khippaṁ nisanti nisāmanaṁ jhānacakkhunā pathavīkasiṇādijhānārammaṇassa
anya-e0104n0:16_10: dassanaṁ etassāti khippanisanti, sīghataraṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitā, tassa bhāvo khippanisantibhāvo.
anya-e0104n0:16_11: Ambatarunicitaṁ mahāmahindattherādīhi otiṇṇaṭṭhānaṁ therambatthalaṁ. Yathā paṭipakkhavijayāya
anya-e0104n0:16_12: yodhājīvā nimmalameva asitomarādiṁ gahetvā vicaranti, evaṁ bhikkhunāpi kilesavijayāya
anya-e0104n0:16_13: nimmalāva jhānābhiññā vaḷañjitabbāti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:17_0: Patiṭṭhābhāvoti idha parassa upaddavūpasamanaṁ adhippetaṁ. Taṁ hi khippanisantibhāvatopi
anya-e0104n0:17_1: garutaraṁ accāyikakiccasādhanavasena vidhātabbato durabhisambhavatarattā. Taṁ pana
anya-e0104n0:17_2: rakkhitattheranidassaneneva siddhampi tato garutarena aṅgāravassaparittāṇena vibhāvetuṁ
anya-e0104n0:17_3: “giribhaṇḍavāhanapūjāya…pe… thero viyā”ti āha. Giribhaṇḍavāhanapūjā nāma cetiyagirimādiṁ
anya-e0104n0:17_4: katvā sakaladīpe, samudde ca yāva yojanā mahatī dīpapūjā. Pathaviṁ māpetvāti mārena
anya-e0104n0:17_5: pavattitaṁ aṅgāravassaṁ phuliṅgamattenapi yāva manusse na pāpuṇāti, tāvadeva ākāse
anya-e0104n0:18_1: attho. Aggasāvakādīnanti ādi-saddena ekacce mahāsāvake saṅgaṇhāti. Bhāvanānukkamo
anya-e0104n0:18_3: saṅgaho veditabbo, na sesābhiññānameva. Sāvakānampi hi ṭhānāṭhānañāṇādīni padesavasena
anya-e0104n0:18_4: ijjhanti. Tasmāti yasmā pubbahetusampannasseva yathāvuttaṁ bhāvanānukkamaṁ vinā abhiññāyo
anya-e0104n0:18_5: ijjhanti, na itarassa, tasmā. Aggidhamanādīhīti aggimhi tāpanakoṭṭanādīhi. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:18_6: cāti ca-saddena lākhākārādīnaṁ lākhākoṭṭanādiṁ avuttampi saṅgaṇhāti. Chanda…pe… vasenāti
anya-e0104n0:18_7: “chandavato ce abhiññā sijjhati, mayhampi sijjhatī”ti kattukamyatāchandaṁ sīsaṁ dhuraṁ
anya-e0104n0:18_8: jeṭṭhaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ katvā, chandaṁ vā uppādetvā taṁ bhāvanāya mukhaṁ katvā jhānassa
anya-e0104n0:18_9: samāpajjanavasena. Eseva nayo sesesupi. “Āvajjanādivasībhāvavasenā”ti idaṁ aṭṭhasupi
anya-e0104n0:18_10: samāpattīsu sātisayaṁ vasībhāvāpādanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Tañca kho ādikammikavasena,
anya-e0104n0:18_11: na katādhikāravasenāti āha “pubbahetu…pe… vaṭṭatī”ti. Pubbahetusampannassa hi yaṁ
anya-e0104n0:18_12: jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā abhiññā nibbattetabbā, tattheva sātisayaṁ ciṇṇavasitāpi icchitabbā,
anya-e0104n0:18_13: na sabbatthevāti adhippāyo. “Catutthajjhānamatte ciṇṇavasinā”ti vacanato arūpasamāpattiyo
anya-e0104n0:18_14: vināpi abhiññā ijjhantīti vadanti. Tampi yadi pubbahetusampannassa vasena vuttaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:18_15: yuttameva. Athetarassa, tesaṁ matimattaṁ. Yathāti yena pakārena yena vidhinā. Etthāti
anya-e0104n0:19_0: 368.Tatrāti ca tadeva paccāmasati. Pāḷinayānusārenevāti pāḷigatiyā anusaraṇeneva,
anya-e0104n0:19_2: “so”ti vuttattā āha “adhigatacatutthajjhāno yogī”ti. “Evaṁ samāhite”ti ettha evaṁ-saddo
anya-e0104n0:19_4: āha “evanti catutthajjhānakkamanidassanameta”nti, catutthajjhānassa, tassa ca adhigamakkamassa
anya-e0104n0:19_5: nidassanaṁ. Yena samādhānānukkamena catutthajjhānasamādhi laddho, tadubhayanidassananti
anya-e0104n0:19_6: attho. Tenāha “iminā…pe… vuttaṁ hotī”ti. Yadipi “eva”nti idaṁ āgamanasamādhinā saddhiṁ
anya-e0104n0:19_7: catutthajjhānasamādhānaṁ dīpeti. Satipārisuddhisamādhi eva pana iddhiyā adhiṭṭhānabhāvato
anya-e0104n0:19_10: hi paccanīkasamanepi abyāvaṭāya pārisuddhiupekkhāya vattamānāya catutthajjhānaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:19_11: taṁsampayuttadhammā ca suparisuddhā, suvisadā ca honti, satisīsena pana tattha desanā
anya-e0104n0:19_12: katāti āha “upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvena parisuddhe”ti. Parisuddhiyā eva paccayavisesena
anya-e0104n0:19_13: pavattiviseso pariyodātatā sudhantasuvaṇṇassa nighaṁsanena pabhassaratā viyāti āha
anya-e0104n0:20_0: Sukhādīnaṁ paccayānaṁ ghātenāti sukhasomanassānaṁ, dukkhadomanassānañca yathākkamaṁ
anya-e0104n0:20_1: rāgadosapaccayānaṁ vikkhambhanena. “Sukhaṁ somanassassa paccayo, somanassaṁ rāgassa,
anya-e0104n0:20_2: dukkhaṁ domanassassā”ti hi vuttaṁ. Yathā rāgādayo cetaso malāsucibhāvena “aṅgaṇānī”ti
anya-e0104n0:20_3: vuccanti, evaṁ upagantvā kilesanaṭṭhena upakkilesāti āha “anaṅgaṇattāyeva vigatūpakkilese”ti.
anya-e0104n0:20_4: Tenāha “aṅgaṇena hi taṁ cittaṁ upakkilissatī”ti, vibādhīyati upatāpīyatīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:20_6: āvajjanādinā pañcadhā, cuddasavidhena vā paridamanena vasavattitaṁ upagateti attho.
anya-e0104n0:20_7: Vase vattamānaṁ hi cittaṁ paguṇabhāvāpattiyā suparimadditaṁ viya cammaṁ, suparikammakatā
anya-e0104n0:20_8: viya ca lākhā mudunti vuccati. Kammakkhameti vikubbanādiiddhikammakkhame. Tañca ubhayanti
anya-e0104n0:21_0: Nāhantiādīsu na-kāro paṭisedhattho. Ahanti satthā attānaṁ niddisati. Bhikkhaveti
anya-e0104n0:21_1: bhikkhū ālapati. Aññanti idāni vuccamānacittato aññaṁ. Ekadhammampīti ekampi sabhāvadhammaṁ
anya-e0104n0:21_2: na samanupassāmīti sambandho. Ayaṁ hettha attho – ahaṁ, bhikkhave, sabbaññutaññāṇena
anya-e0104n0:21_3: olokentopi aññaṁ ekadhammampi na samanupassāmi. Yaṁ vasībhāvāpādanena bhāvitaṁ, tathā
anya-e0104n0:21_4: punappunaṁ karaṇena bahulīkataṁ, evaṁ savisesamudubhāvappattiyā muduṁ, kammakkhamatāya
anya-e0104n0:21_5: kammaniyañca hoti. Yathayidaṁ cittanti attano, tesañca paccakkhatāya evamāhāti. Yathā
anya-e0104n0:21_6: yathāvuttā parisuddhatādayo na vigacchanti, evaṁ subhāvitaṁ cittaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:22_0: Tattha avaṭṭhitaṁ idha “ṭhitaṁ, āneñjappatta”nti ca vuttanti āha “etesu parisuddhatādīsu
anya-e0104n0:22_1: ṭhitattā ṭhite, ṭhitattāyeva āneñjappatte”ti. Yathā mudukammaññatā vasībhāvappattiyā
anya-e0104n0:22_2: lakkhīyanti, evaṁ vasībhāvappattipi mudukammaññatāhi lakkhīyatīti, mudukammaññabhāvena
anya-e0104n0:22_3: vā attano vase ṭhitattā “ṭhite”ti vuttaṁ. Yathā hi kāraṇena phalaṁ niddharīyati,
anya-e0104n0:22_4: evaṁ phalenāpi kāraṇaṁ niddharīyatīti niccalabhāvena avaṭṭhānaṁ āneñjappatti. Sā
anya-e0104n0:22_5: ca sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena, paṭipakkhehi akammaniyatāya ca sambhavantī saddhādibalānaṁ
anya-e0104n0:22_6: ānubhāvena hotīti “saddhādīhi pariggahitattā āneñjappatte”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṁ
anya-e0104n0:22_7: vivarituṁ “saddhāpariggahitaṁ hī”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha saddhāpariggahitanti evaṁ subhāvitaṁ
anya-e0104n0:22_8: vasībhāvappattaṁ etaṁ cittaṁ ekaṁsena abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṁ dhammānaṁ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya
anya-e0104n0:22_9: saṁvattatīti evaṁ pavattāya saddhāya pariggahitaṁ yathāvuttasaddhābalena upatthambhitaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:22_10: Assaddhiyenāti tappaṭipakkhena assaddhiyena hetunā na iñjati na calati na kampati,
anya-e0104n0:22_11: aññadatthu upari visesāvahabhāveneva tiṭṭhati. Vīriyapariggahitantiādīsupi iminā
anya-e0104n0:22_12: nayena attho veditabbo. Ayaṁ pana viseso – vīriyapariggahitanti vasībhāvāpādanaparidamanasādhanena

anya-e0104n0:51_2: iddhikoṭṭhāsāya, iddhivikappāya vā”ti. Iddhi hi abhiññāsu eko koṭṭhāso, vakkhamānehi
anya-e0104n0:51_3: bhedehi anekappabhedā ca. Vuttappakāravasenāti vuttassa cuddasappakārassa, cittaparidamanassa
anya-e0104n0:51_6: samānasantānatāya vuttaṁ, na parikammacittassa kasiṇārammaṇattā. Iddhividhābhimukhaṁ
anya-e0104n0:51_7: pesetīti nipphādetabbassa iddhividhassa abhimukhabhāvena pavatteti. Yaṁ hi “sataṁ
anya-e0104n0:51_8: homī”tiādinā parikammacittassa pavattanaṁ, tadevassa abhinīharaṇaṁ, iddhividhābhimukhapesanañca
anya-e0104n0:51_9: tatheva iddhividhassa pavattanato abhininnāmanaṁ idha parikammacittassa iddhividhe
anya-e0104n0:51_10: adhimuttīti āha “adhigantabbaiddhipoṇaṁ iddhipabbhāraṁ karotī”ti. Idha paccanubhavanaphusanā
anya-e0104n0:51_11: sacchikiriyāpattipariyāyā evāti dassento “pāpuṇātīti attho”ti āha. Assāti iddhividhassa.
anya-e0104n0:52_0: Ekopīti pi-saddo vakkhamānaṁ bahubhāvaṁ upādāya sampiṇḍanattho. So hissa paṭiyogī
anya-e0104n0:52_1: “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hotī”ti. So ca kho bahubhāvaṁ nimminitvā
anya-e0104n0:52_2: ṭhitassa antarāva ekabhāvūpagamo. Yathākālaparicchedaṁ pana saraseneva ekabhāvūpagamo
anya-e0104n0:52_3: idha nādhippeto aniddhinimmānabhāvato. Tampi pubbe katakālaparicchedavasena siddhattā
anya-e0104n0:52_4: iddhānubhāvoyevāti keci. Aṭṭhāne vāyaṁ pi-saddo, eko hutvā bahudhāpi hoti, bahudhā
anya-e0104n0:52_5: hutvā ekopi hotīti sambandho. Imasmiṁ pakkhe pi-saddo vakkhamānaṁ ekabhāvaṁ upādāya
anya-e0104n0:52_6: “sampiṇḍanattho”ti vatvā “so hī”tiādi sabbaṁ yathārahaṁ vattabbaṁ. Bahubhāvanimmāne
anya-e0104n0:52_7: payojanaṁ dassetuṁ “bahūnaṁ santike”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha bahūnaṁ santiketi attanā
anya-e0104n0:52_8: nimmitānaṁ bahūnaṁ samīpe, tehi parivārito hutvāti adhippāyo. Vā-saddo avuttavikappattho,
anya-e0104n0:52_9: tena “dhammaṁ vā kathetukāmo”ti evamādi saṅgayhati. “Ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahanto evaṁ hotī”ti
anya-e0104n0:53_0: 381. Bhavati ettha iddhīti bhūmiyo, jhānāni. Etthāti ca hetumhi bhummavacanaṁ. Vivekato
anya-e0104n0:53_1: jātā bhūmi vivekajabhūmi. Vivekajaṁ hi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ nīvaraṇavivekasambhūtattā.
anya-e0104n0:53_2: Pītisukhabhūtā bhūmi pītisukhabhūmi. Dutiyajjhānañhi pītisukhabhūmibhūtañceva pītisukhasañjātañca
anya-e0104n0:53_3: samādhivasena. Upari dvīsupi eseva nayo. Iddhilābhāyāti iddhiyā adhigamāya. Iddhipaṭilābhāyāti
anya-e0104n0:53_4: iddhiyā punappunaṁ labhamānāya, bahulīkaraṇāyāti attho. Iddhivikubbanatāyāti iddhiyā
anya-e0104n0:53_5: vividharūpakāraṇāya, vikubbaniddhiyāti attho. Iddhivisavitāyāti iddhiyā vividhānisaṁsapasavanāya.
anya-e0104n0:53_7: iddhiyā paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena vigatasaṁkilesatāya suṭṭhu visāradabhāvāya. Catutthajjhānaṁ
anya-e0104n0:53_8: tāva iddhiyā bhūmi hotu tattha patiṭṭhāya nipphādetabbato, itarāni pana kathanti
anya-e0104n0:53_9: āha “ettha cā”tiādi. Tattha tīṇi jhānāni sambhārabhūmiyoti veditabbānīti sambandho.
anya-e0104n0:53_10: Tatiyajjhāne sukhapharaṇena, paṭhamadutiyesu pītipharaṇena sukhapharaṇena ca hetubhūtenāti
anya-e0104n0:53_11: yathārahavasena yojanā. Pharaṇaṁ cettha jhānassa subhāvitabhāvena sātisayānaṁ pītisukhānaṁ
anya-e0104n0:53_12: vasena jhānappaccayādinā sahajātanāmakāyassa paribrūhanaṁ, rūpakāyassa ca taṁsamuṭṭhānehi
anya-e0104n0:53_13: paṇītarūpehi paripphuṭatā. Tenāha bhagavā “pītisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti
anya-e0104n0:53_14: parippharatī”ti. Sukhasaññanti jhānasukhena sahagataṁ saññaṁ. Lahusaññanti taṁsampayuttalahutāsahagataṁ
anya-e0104n0:53_15: saññaṁ. Okkamitvāti anupavisitvā. Tesu hi jhānesu sātisayāya lahutāya sampayuttaṁ
anya-e0104n0:53_16: sukhaṁ santānavasena pavattento yogī taṁ samokkanto viya hotīti evaṁ vuttaṁ. Saññāsīsena
anya-e0104n0:53_17: niddeso. Jhānasampayuttā hi lahutā vināpi iddhiyā ākāsaṁ laṅghāpanappamāṇappattā
anya-e0104n0:53_18: viya hoti. Lahubhāvaggahaṇeneva cettha mudukammaññabhāvāpi gahitā eva. Tenāha “lahumudukammaññakāyo hutvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:54_1: sati cittaparidamane catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sukheneva iddhipaṭilābhāya saṁvattatīti iminā
anya-e0104n0:54_2: pariyāyena. Pakatibhūmiyā hi adhiṭṭhānabhūtā sambhārabhūmiyo pākārassa nemippadeso viyāti.
anya-e0104n0:55_0: 382. Iddhipādaniddese cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo. Iddhipādāti ettha ijjhatīti iddhi,
anya-e0104n0:55_1: samijjhati nipphajjatīti attho. Ijjhanti vā etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṁsagatā
anya-e0104n0:55_2: hontīti iddhi. Paṭhamenatthena iddhi eva pādoti iddhipādo, iddhikoṭṭhāsoti attho.
anya-e0104n0:55_3: Dutiyenatthena iddhiyā pādoti iddhipādo. Pādoti patiṭṭhā, adhigamūpāyoti attho. Tena
anya-e0104n0:55_4: hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṁ iddhiṁ pajjanti pāpuṇanti. Ayaṁ tāva aṭṭhakathānayo.
anya-e0104n0:55_5: Tattha iddhi-saddassa paṭhamo kattuattho, dutiyo karaṇattho vutto. Pāda-saddassa
anya-e0104n0:55_6: eko karaṇatthova. Pajjitabbāva iddhi vuttā, na ca ijjhantī, pajjitabbā ca iddhi pajjanakaraṇena
anya-e0104n0:55_7: pādena samānādhikaraṇā hotīti paṭhamena atthena “iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo”ti na sakkā
anya-e0104n0:55_8: vattuṁ. Tathā iddhikiriyākaraṇena sādhetabbāva vuddhisaṅkhātā iddhi pajjanakiriyākaraṇena
anya-e0104n0:55_9: pajjitabbāti dvinnaṁ karaṇānaṁ na asamānādhikaraṇatā sambhavatīti dutiyenatthena
anya-e0104n0:55_10: “iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo”ti ca na sakkā vattuṁ. Tasmā paṭhamenatthena samānādhikaraṇasamāso,
anya-e0104n0:55_11: dutiyena sāmivacanasamāso na yujjatīti paṭhamenatthena iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo, dutiyenatthena
anya-e0104n0:55_12: iddhi eva pādo iddhipādoti samāso yutto, yathāvuttopi vā, pādassa ijjhamānakoṭṭhāsaijjhanakaraṇūpāyabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:56_1: eva pana sahajātachandassāpi adhikatā veditabbā. Atha vā “chandañce bhikkhu adhipatiṁ
anya-e0104n0:56_2: karitvā labhati samādhiṁ, labhati cittassekaggataṁ, ayaṁ vuccati chandasamādhī”ti
anya-e0104n0:56_3: imāya pāḷiyā chandādhipatisamādhi chandasamādhīti adhipati-saddalopaṁ katvā samāso
anya-e0104n0:56_5: chandādhiko vā samādhī”ti vuttaṁ. Tenevāha “chandaṁ adhipatiṁ karitvā”tiādi. Padhānabhūtāti
anya-e0104n0:56_6: vīriyabhūtāti keci vadanti. Saṅkhatasaṅkhāranivattanatthaṁ pana padhānaggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:56_7: Atha vā taṁ taṁ visesaṁ saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro, sabbampi vīriyaṁ. Tattha catukiccasādhakato
anya-e0104n0:56_8: aññassa nivattanatthaṁ padhānaggahaṇaṁ. Padhānabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtāti attho. Catubbidhassa
anya-e0104n0:56_9: pana vīriyassa adhippetattā bahuvacananiddeso. Yo pana “iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo”ti
anya-e0104n0:56_10: evaṁ samāsayojanāvasena pādassa upāyatthataṁ gahetvā iddhipādattho vutto, so paṭilābhapubbabhāgānaṁ
anya-e0104n0:56_11: kattukaraṇiddhibhāvaṁ “chandiddhipādo”tiādinā vā abhidhamme āgatattā chandādīhi iddhipādehi
anya-e0104n0:56_12: sādhetabbāya vuddhiyā kattiddhibhāvaṁ, chandādīnaṁ karaṇiddhibhāvañca sandhāya vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0104n0:57_1: Tattha purimaṁ samādhivisesanaṁ vīriyādhipati samādhi vīriyasamādhīti. Dutiyaṁ samannāgamaṅgadassanaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:57_2: Dve eva hi sabbattha samannāgamaṅgāni samādhi, padhānasaṅkhāro ca. Chandādayo samādhivisesanāni,
anya-e0104n0:57_3: padhānasaṅkhāro pana padhānavacaneneva visesito, na chandādīhīti na idha vīriyādhipatitā
anya-e0104n0:57_4: padhānasaṅkhārassa vuttā hoti. Vīriyañca samādhiṁ visesetvā ṭhitameva samannāgamaṅgavasena
anya-e0104n0:57_5: padhānasaṅkhāravacanena vuttanti nāpi dvīhi vīriyehi samannāgamo vutto hotīti. Yasmā
anya-e0104n0:57_6: pana chandādīhi visiṭṭho samādhi, tathā visiṭṭheneva ca tena sampayutto padhānasaṅkhāro,
anya-e0104n0:57_7: sesadhammā ca, tasmā samādhivisesanānaṁ vasena cattāro iddhipādā vuttā. Visesanabhāvo
anya-e0104n0:58_0: Atha vātiādinā nissayaṭṭhepi pāda-sadde upāyaṭṭhena chandādīnaṁ iddhipādatā vuttā.
anya-e0104n0:58_1: Teneva abhidhamme uttaracūḷabhājanīye “cattāro iddhipādā chandiddhipādo”tiādinā chandādīnameva
anya-e0104n0:58_2: iddhipādatā vuttā. Pañhāpucchake ca “cattāro iddhipādā idha bhikkhu chandasamādhī”tiādināva
anya-e0104n0:58_3: uddesaṁ katvāpi puna chandādīnaṁyeva kusalādibhāvo vibhatto. Upāyiddhipādadassanatthameva
anya-e0104n0:58_4: hi sutte, abhidhamme ca nissayiddhipādadassanaṁ kataṁ, aññathā catubbidhatā na hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:59_1: evaṁ chandādīni aṭṭha. Kāmaṁ cettha catūsupi ṭhānesu samādhi samādhi eva, tathāpi
anya-e0104n0:59_2: iddhiṁ uppādetukāmatāchandasahitova samādhi iddhipaṭilābhāya saṁvattati, na kevalo.
anya-e0104n0:59_3: Evaṁ vīriyasamādhiādayopi. Tasmā chandādisahitā ete cattāro ca samādhī, chandādayo
anya-e0104n0:59_4: ca cattāroti aṭṭha pajjati iddhi etehi pāpuṇīyati, sayaṁ vā pajjanti iddhipaṭilābhāya
anya-e0104n0:59_5: sampajjantīti padānīti vuccanti. Tenāha “iddhipaṭilābhāya saṁvattantī”ti. Yaṁ pana
anya-e0104n0:59_6: pāḷiyaṁ “chando na samādhī”tiādi, taṁ yadipi chandādayo samādhisahitāva iddhiṁ nipphādenti,
anya-e0104n0:59_7: tathāpi visuṁ nesaṁ padabhāvadassanaṁ. Ekato niyuttova, na ekeko hutvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:60_0: 384.Anonatanti na onataṁ, vīriyena paggahitattā alīnanti attho. Tenāha “kosajje na
anya-e0104n0:60_1: iñjatī”ti, kosajjanimittaṁ na calatīti attho. Uddhaṁ nataṁ unnataṁ, uddhataṁ vikkhittaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:60_2: Na unnataṁ anunnataṁ, avikkhittaṁ samāhitanti attho. Tenāha “uddhacce na iñjatī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:60_3: Abhisaṅgavasena nataṁ abhinataṁ, na abhinataṁ anabhinataṁ, arattaṁ. Apagamanavasena
anya-e0104n0:60_4: nataṁ apanataṁ, kodhavasena vimukhaṁ. Na apanataṁ anapanataṁ, aduṭṭhaṁ. Diṭṭhiyā
anya-e0104n0:60_5: “ahaṁ, mama”nti nissayavasena na nissitanti anissitaṁ. Chandarāgavasena na paṭibaddhanti
anya-e0104n0:60_6: appaṭibaddhaṁ. Rāgo kevalaṁ āsattimattaṁ, chandarāgo pana bahalakileso. Tathā hissa
anya-e0104n0:60_7: dūre ṭhitampi ārammaṇaṁ paṭibaddhameva. Vippamuttanti visesato pamuttaṁ. Jhānānaṁ
anya-e0104n0:60_8: kāmarāgapaṭipakkhatāya āha “kāmarāge”ti. Visaṁyuttanti vivittaṁ saṁkilesato, na vā
anya-e0104n0:60_9: saṁyuttaṁ catūhipi yogehi. Vimariyādikataṁ kilesamariyādāya, yathā īsakampi kilesamariyādā
anya-e0104n0:60_10: na hoti, tathā paṭipannaṁ. Ekattagatanti ekaggataṁ upagataṁ accantameva samāhitaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:60_11: Tato eva nānattakilesehi nānāsabhāvehi kilesehi na iñjati.
anya-e0104n0:61_0: Esa atthoti kosajjādinimittaṁ. Imassa cittassa āneñjanattho siddho eva āneñjappattiyā
anya-e0104n0:61_1: pakāsanavasena dassitattā. Puna vuttoti iddhiyā bhūmipādapadadassanappasaṅgena “imāni
anya-e0104n0:61_2: mūlāni nāmā”ti mūlabhāvadassanatthaṁ puna vutto. Purimoti “saddhādīhi pariggahitattā”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:61_3: pubbe chadhā dassitanayo. Ayanti adhunā soḷasadhā dassitanayo. Suttanaye, paṭisambhidānaye
anya-e0104n0:61_4: ca dassite tattha sammoho na hoti, na adassiteti āha “ubhayattha asammohattha”nti.
anya-e0104n0:62_0: 385.Ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahantoti “kathaṁ panāyaṁ evaṁ hotī”ti ettha pubbe attanā vuttapadaṁ
anya-e0104n0:62_1: uddharati adhiṭṭhānavidhiṁ dassetuṁ “abhiññāpādakaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāyā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:62_2: Ettha anupubbena cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā catutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāyāti keci, taṁ
anya-e0104n0:62_4: ca abhiññāpādakaṁ, na itarāni. Parikammaṁ katvāti pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kāmāvacaracittena
anya-e0104n0:62_5: “sataṁ homī”tiādinā cintanamevettha parikammakaraṇaṁ, tathāvajjanameva ca āvajjanaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:62_6: Dutiyampīti pi-saddo samuccayattho, tena tatiyampi, tato bhiyyopīti imamatthaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0104n0:62_7: Yathā hi jhānabhāvanā, evamabhiññābhāvanāpi. “Ekavāraṁ dvevāra”nti idampi nidassanamattaṁ
anya-e0104n0:62_9: ekekassa parikammacittassa satārammaṇatā daṭṭhabbā “sataṁ homī”ti pavattanato. Sahassārammaṇānīti
anya-e0104n0:62_10: etthāpi eseva nayo. Vaṇṇavasenāti attanā parikappitavaṇṇavasena. No paṇṇattivasenāti
anya-e0104n0:62_11: na sattapaṇṇattivasena. Taṁ adhiṭṭhānacittaṁ appanācittamivāti ivaggahaṇaṁ abhiññācittassa
anya-e0104n0:62_12: jhānacittassa paṭhamuppattisadisabhāvato vuttaṁ, na tassa appanābhāvato. Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānikanti
anya-e0104n0:63_0: 386. Yadi evaṁ “āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhātī”ti paṭisambhidāvacanaṁ kathanti āha “yampī”tiādi.
anya-e0104n0:63_1: Tatrāpīti paṭisambhidāyampi. Āvajjatīti “bahukaṁ āvajjatī”ti idaṁ pāṭhapadaṁ parikammavaseneva
anya-e0104n0:63_2: vuttaṁ, na āvajjanavasena. Āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhātīti abhiññāñāṇavasena vuttaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:63_3: na parikammacittasampayuttassa, aññassa vā kāmāvacarassa ñāṇassa vasena. Na hi tassa
anya-e0104n0:63_4: tādiso ānubhāvo atthīti. Tasmāti yasmā appanāppattassa abhiññāñāṇasseva vasena adhiṭṭhānaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:63_5: tasmā. Ayamadhiṭṭhānakkamoti dassento “bahukaṁ āvajjatī”tiādimāha. Tattha sanniṭṭhāpanavasenāti nipphādanavasena.
anya-e0104n0:64: Kāyasakkhidassanatthanti na kevalaṁ vacanamattameva, atha kho ayametassatthassa attano kāyena sacchikatattā kāyasakkhīti sakkhidassanatthaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:65_0: Kokanadanti padumavisesanaṁ yathā “kokāsaka”nti. Taṁ kira bahupattaṁ, vaṇṇasampannaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:65_1: ativiya sugandhañca hoti. Pātoti pageva. Ayañhettha attho – yathā kokanadasaṅkhātaṁ
anya-e0104n0:65_2: padumaṁ pāto sūriyassuggamanavelāyaṁ phullaṁ vikasitaṁ avītagandhaṁ siyā virocamānaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:65_3: evaṁ sarīragandhena, guṇagandhena ca sugandhaṁ saradakāle antalikkhe ādiccamiva attano
anya-e0104n0:65_4: tejasā tapantaṁ aṅgehi niccharaṇakajutitāya aṅgīrasaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ passāti.
anya-e0104n0:66_0: Abhabboti paṭipattisāramidaṁ sāsanaṁ, paṭipatti ca pariyattimūlikā, tvañca pariyattiṁ
anya-e0104n0:66_1: uggahetuṁ asamattho, tasmā abhabboti adhippāyo. Abhabbo nāma na hoti vāsadhurasseva padhānabhāvato.
anya-e0104n0:67_0: Bhikkhūti pabbajitavohārena vuttaṁ, bhāvinaṁ vā bhikkhubhāvaṁ upādāya yathā “agamā
anya-e0104n0:67_1: rājagahaṁ buddho”ti. Pilotikakhaṇḍanti suvisuddhaṁ coḷakhaṇḍaṁ. Rajo haratīti rajoharaṇaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:67_2: Abhinimminitvā adāsi tattha pubbe katādhikārattā. Tathā hi yoniso ummujjanto “attabhāvassa
anya-e0104n0:67_3: panāyaṁ doso”ti asubhasaññaṁ, aniccasaññañca paṭilabhitvā nāmarūpapariggahādinā pañcasu
anya-e0104n0:67_4: khandhesu ñāṇaṁ otāretvā kalāpasammasanādikkamena vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā udayabbayañāṇādipaṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0104n0:67_5: vipassanaṁ anulomagotrabhusamīpaṁ pāpesi. Obhāsavissajjanapubbikā bhāsitagāthā obhāsagāthā.
anya-e0104n0:68_0: Rāgo rajo ariyassa vinaye, na ca pana reṇu vuccati “rajo”ti. Kasmā? Cittassa malīnabhāvakaraṇato.
anya-e0104n0:68_1: Rāgassetaṁ adhivacanaṁ “rajo”ti. Etaṁ rajanti etaṁ rāgasaṅkhātaṁ rajaṁ. Vippajahitvāti
anya-e0104n0:68_2: aggamaggena visesato pajahanahetu. Paṇḍitā viharanti teti te pajahanakā paṇḍitā hutvā
anya-e0104n0:68_3: viharanti. Vītarajassa sabbaso pahīnarāgādirajassa buddhassa bhagavato sāsane. Tathā hi vadanti –
anya-e0104n0:70: Citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṁ mahesinā”ti. ;
anya-e0104n0:71: Chaḷabhiññāgahaṇena gahitāya chaḷabhiññāya vibhāvitepi ariyamagge anuttarabhāvasāmaññena phalanibbānehi saddhiṁ saṅgaṇhanto āha “nava lokuttaradhammā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:72: Pattassa pidahanākārena hatthaṁ ṭhapento “hatthaṁ pidahī”ti vutto. Hatthanti vā karaṇatthe upayogavacanaṁ, hatthena pidahīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:73_0: Sahassakkhattunti sahassadhā. Sahassadhā hi attānaṁ ekacitteneva nimminantopi sahassavāraṁ
anya-e0104n0:73_1: nimminanto viya hoti. Asatipi kiriyābyāvuttiyaṁ tadatthasiddhitoti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ
anya-e0104n0:73_2: “sahassakkhattu”nti vuttaṁ. Ambavaneti ambavane katavihāre. Rammeti ramaṇīye. Yāva
anya-e0104n0:74_1: nānākāre yathāvuttavaṇṇādivasena nānāvidhe. Missakakeseti palitehi missitakese. Upaḍḍharattavaṇṇaupaḍḍhapaṇḍuvaṇṇādīsu
anya-e0104n0:74_2: aññataravaṇṇanti evaṁ upaḍḍharattacīvare. Padavasena atthassa, gamanavasena pāḷiyā
anya-e0104n0:74_3: bhaṇanaṁ padabhāṇaṁ. Parikathādivasena dhammassa kathanaṁ dhammakathā. Sarena bhaññaṁ
anya-e0104n0:74_4: suttādīnaṁ uccāraṇaṁ sarabhaññaṁ. Aparepīti vuttākārato aññepi dīgharassakisathūlādike
anya-e0104n0:74_5: nānappakārake. Icchiticchitappakārāyeva hontīti yathā yathā icchitā, taṁtaṁpakārāyeva
anya-e0104n0:74_6: honti. Yattakā hi visesā vaṇṇādivasena tesu icchitā, tattakavisesavantova te honti.
anya-e0104n0:74_7: Te pana tathā bahudhā bhinnākārepi vaṇṇavasena ārammaṇaṁ katvā ekameva adhiṭṭhānacittaṁ
anya-e0104n0:74_8: pavattati. Ayaṁ hissa ānubhāvo – yathā ekāva cetanā nānāvisesavantaṁ attabhāvaṁ nibbatteti,
anya-e0104n0:74_9: tattha bhavapatthanā kammassa visesapaccayo hoti. Acinteyyo ca kammavipākoti ce,
anya-e0104n0:74_10: idhāpi parikammacittaṁ visesapaccayo hoti, acinteyyo ca iddhivisayoti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:74_11: Esa nayoti yvāyaṁ bahubhāvanimmāne “abhiññāpādakaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā”tiādinā adhiṭṭhānanayo
anya-e0104n0:75_0: Iti avisesaṁ atidesena dassetvā visesaṁ sarūpato dassetuṁ “ayaṁ pana viseso”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:75_1: vuttaṁ. Tattha iminā bhikkhunā icchantenāti sambandho. Maṁ jānissantīti “iddhimā”ti
anya-e0104n0:75_2: maṁ jānissanti. Antarāvāti paricchinnakālassa abbhantare eva. Pādakajjhānantiādi
anya-e0104n0:75_3: parikammakaraṇākāradassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ, itaraṁ pana atideseneva vibhāvitanti. Evaṁ
anya-e0104n0:75_5: iminā “sataṁ homī”tiādinā adhiṭṭhānaṁ karontena kālaparicchedavaseneva kātabbanti
anya-e0104n0:75_6: dasseti. Sayameva eko hoti adhiṭṭhānassa paṭippassaddhattā. Ettha ca parikammādhiṭṭhānacittānaṁ
anya-e0104n0:75_7: iddhimā vaṇṇavasena sayameva ārammaṇaṁ hoti. Tesu parikammacittāni santatipaccuppannārammaṇāni.
anya-e0104n0:76_0: 387.“Āvibhāva”nti padassa heṭṭhā vuttena hoti-saddena sambandho na yujjati upayogavacanena
anya-e0104n0:76_1: vuttattā, tathā vakkhamānena ca gacchati-saddena attano, paresañca āvibhāvassa icchitattā,
anya-e0104n0:76_2: nāmapadañca kiriyāpadāpekkhanti kiriyāsāmaññavācinā karoti-saddena yojetvā āha “āvibhāvaṁ
anya-e0104n0:76_3: karotī”ti. Tirobhāvanti etthāpi eseva nayo. Yadi evaṁ kathaṁ paṭisambhidāyanti codanaṁ
anya-e0104n0:76_4: sandhāyāha “idameva hī”tiādi. Kāmaṁ paṭisambhidāyaṁ “āvibhāvanti kenaci anāvaṭaṁ
anya-e0104n0:76_5: hotī”tiādinā āgataṁ, tampi idameva āvibhāvakaraṇaṁ, tirobhāvakaraṇañca sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:76_6: Sesapadāni tesaṁyeva vevacanāni. Andhakāranti rattandhakāraṁ, divāpi vā bilaguhādigataṁ
anya-e0104n0:76_7: andhakāraṁ. Paṭicchannanti kuṭṭakavāṭādinā paṭicchāditaṁ. Anāpāthanti dūratāsukhumataratādinā
anya-e0104n0:76_8: na āpāthagataṁ. Ayanti iddhimā. Paṭicchannopi dūre ṭhitopi attā vā paro vā yathā
anya-e0104n0:76_9: dissatīti vibhattiṁ pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṁ. Ālokajātanti ālokabhūtaṁ, jātālokaṁ vā.
anya-e0104n0:77_0: 388.Etaṁ pana pāṭihāriyanti āvibhāvapāṭihāriyamāha. Kena katapubbanti tattha kāyasakkhiṁ
anya-e0104n0:77_1: pucchitvā “satthā tāva kāyasakkhī”ti dassentena “bhagavatā”ti vatvā tamatthaṁ vibhāvetuṁ
anya-e0104n0:77_2: “bhagavā hī”tiādi vuttaṁ. Sāvatthivāsike passantīti ānetvā sambandho, tathā “yāva
anya-e0104n0:77_3: avīciṁ dassesī”ti. Ākāsagatesu heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimavimānesu uparūparivimānaṁ byavadhāyakesu
anya-e0104n0:77_4: byūhiyamānesu taggataṁ ākāsaṁ byūḷhaṁ nāma hotīti vuttaṁ “ākāsañca dvidhā viyūhitvā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:78_0: Ayamatthoti āvibhāvapāṭihāriyassa satthārā katabhāvo. Purimabuddhānaṁ paṭipattiāvajjanaṁ
anya-e0104n0:78_1: buddhappaveṇiyā anupālanatthaṁ. “Ekena pādenā”tiādi tivikkamadassanaṁ. Nayaṁ deti
anya-e0104n0:80: Sinerupabbataṁnibbijjhitvāti taṁ parisāya dissamānarūpaṁyeva katvā nibbijjhitvā. Nanti sinerupabbataṁ.
anya-e0104n0:81: Anekasatasahassasaṅkhassa okāsalokassa, taṁnivāsisattalokassa ca vivaṭabhāvakaraṇapāṭihāriyaṁ lokavivaraṇaṁ nāma. Mahābrahmāti sahampatimahābrahmā.
anya-e0104n0:82: Passatha tāva apaṇṇakapaṭipadāya phalanti nirayabhayena tajjetvā satthu anupubbikathānayena saggasukhena palobhetvā, na pana saggasampattiyaṁ ninnabhāvāpādanena.
anya-e0104n0:83_0: 389. Yathā āvibhāvakaraṇe ālokakasiṇaṁ samāpajjitabbaṁ ālokanimmānāya, evaṁ tirobhāvakaraṇe
anya-e0104n0:83_1: andhakāranimmānāya nīlakasiṇaṁ samāpajjitabbaṁ. Kāmañcetaṁ pāḷiyaṁ sarūpato nāgataṁ,
anya-e0104n0:83_2: “vivaṭaṁ āvaṭa”nti pana vacanato atthato āgatameva. Odātakasiṇantogadhaṁ vā ālokakasiṇanti
anya-e0104n0:85_0: 391. Pākaṭo iddhimā etassa atthīti pākaṭaṁ, pākaṭañca taṁ pāṭihāriyañcāti pākaṭapāṭihāriyaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:85_1: Na ettha iddhimā pākaṭoti apākaṭaṁ, apākaṭañca taṁ pāṭihāriyañcāti apākaṭapāṭihāriyaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:85_2: Iddhimato eva hi pākaṭāpākaṭabhāvenāyaṁ bhedo, na pāṭihāriyassa. Na hi taṁ apākaṭaṁ atthi.
anya-e0104n0:86_0: Uttarimanussadhammāti manussadhammo vuccati dasa kusalakammapathadhammā, tato manussadhammato
anya-e0104n0:86_1: uttari. Iddhisaṅkhātaṁ pāṭihāriyaṁ iddhipāṭihāriyaṁ. Āḷindeti pamukhe. Okāsehīti
anya-e0104n0:86_2: pakira. Iddhābhisaṅkhāranti iddhipayogaṁ. Abhisaṅkhāsīti abhisaṅkhari, akāsīti attho.
anya-e0104n0:87_0: Antarahitoti antaradhāyitukāmo. Bako brahmā yathā antaradhāyituṁ na sakkoti, tathā
anya-e0104n0:87_1: katvā bhagavā sayaṁ tassa, brahmagaṇassa ca anāpāthabhāvagamanena antarahito hutvā
anya-e0104n0:87_2: “samaṇassa gotamassa imasmiṁ ṭhāne atthibhāvo vā natthibhāvo vā na sakkā jānitu”nti
anya-e0104n0:87_3: evaṁ brahmagaṇassa vacanokāso mā hotūti “bhavevāha”nti imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi.
anya-e0104n0:88_0: Tattha bhavevāhaṁ bhayaṁ disvāti ahaṁ bhave saṁsāre jātijarādibhedaṁ bhayaṁ disvā
anya-e0104n0:88_1: eva. Bhavañca vibhavesinanti imañca kāmabhavādiṁ tividhampi sattabhavaṁ, vibhavesinaṁ
anya-e0104n0:88_2: vibhavaṁ gavesamānampi pariyesamānampi punappunaṁ bhave eva disvā. Bhavaṁ nābhivadinti
anya-e0104n0:88_3: taṇhādiṭṭhivasena kiñci bhavaṁ na abhivadiṁ na gahesiṁ. Nandiñca na upādiyinti bhavataṇhaṁ
anya-e0104n0:89_0: 392.Alaggamānoti vinivijjhitvā gamanena kuṭṭādīsu katthaci na laggamāno. Āvajjitvā
anya-e0104n0:89_1: kataparikammenāti yassa parato gantukāmo, taṁ āvajjitvā “ākāso hotu, ākāso hotū”ti
anya-e0104n0:89_2: evaṁ kataparikammena iddhimatā. Pākārapabbatāpekkhāya “susiro, chiddo”ti ca pulliṅgavasena
anya-e0104n0:89_3: vuttaṁ. Ubbedhavasena pavattaṁ vivaraṁ susiraṁ. Tiriyaṁ pavattaṁ chiddaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:90_0: Yattha katthaci kasiṇe parikammaṁ katvāti pathavīkasiṇādīsu yattha katthaci kasiṇe
anya-e0104n0:90_1: jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā parikammaṁ katvā “ākāso hotū”ti adhiṭṭhātabbo. Tattha kāraṇamāha
anya-e0104n0:90_2: “aṭṭhasamāpattivasībhāvoyeva pamāṇa”nti. Tasmā yaṁ yaṁ icchati, taṁ tadeva hoti.
anya-e0104n0:90_3: Etena pathaviyā ummujjananimujjane āpokasiṇasamāpajjanaṁ, udakādīsu pathavīnimmāne
anya-e0104n0:90_4: pathavīkasiṇasamāpajjanaṁ na ekantato icchitabbanti vuttaṁ hoti. Etanti etaṁ tirokuṭṭādigamanapāṭihāriyakaraṇe
anya-e0104n0:90_5: ākāsakasiṇasamāpajjanaṁ avassaṁ vattabbaṁ anucchavikabhāvato. Evañca katvā “ākāsakasiṇavasena
anya-e0104n0:90_6: paṭicchannānaṁ vivaṭakaraṇa”ntiādivacanaṁ viya pathavīkasiṇavasena “ekopi hutvā bahudhā
anya-e0104n0:90_7: hotī”tiādibhāvo “ākāse vā udake vā pathaviṁ nimminitvā padasā gamanaṁ icchatī”tiādinā
anya-e0104n0:90_8: yaṁ pakiṇṇakanaye vuttaṁ, tampi samatthitaṁ hoti.
anya-e0104n0:91_0: “Doso natthī”ti dvikkhattuṁ baddhaṁ subaddhaṁ viya daḷhīkaraṇaṁ nāma hotīti adhippāyena
anya-e0104n0:91_1: vatvā tena payojanābhāvaṁ dassetuṁ “puna samāpajjitvā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Adhiṭṭhitattā
anya-e0104n0:91_2: ākāso hotiyevāti sacepi kiñci antarā upaṭṭhitaṁ pabbatādi siyā, tampi “ākāso hotū”ti
anya-e0104n0:91_3: adhiṭṭhitattā ākāso hotiyeva. Idampi aṭṭhānaparikappanamattaṁ, tādisassa upaṭṭhānameva
anya-e0104n0:92_0: 393.Paricchinditvāti yathicchitaṭṭhānaṁ ñāṇena paricchinditvā. Tatrāti tasmiṁ pathaviyā
anya-e0104n0:92_1: udakabhāvādhiṭṭhāne ayaṁ yathāvuttapaṭipattivibhāvinī pāḷi. Parato “tatrāyaṁ pāḷī”ti
anya-e0104n0:93: Soti iddhimā. Adhiṭṭhānakāle kālaparicchedaṁ katvā adhiṭṭhātīti vuttaṁ “paricchinnakālaṁ pana atikkamitvā”ti. Pakatiyā udakaṁ animmānaudakaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:94: 394.Viparītanti yaṁ udakaṁ akkamitvā akkamanto na saṁsīdati, taṁ panettha iddhiyā pathavīnimmānavasena veditabbaṁ. Pathavīkasiṇanti pathavīkasiṇajjhānaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:95_0: 395.Pallaṅkanti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṁ. Chinnapakkho, asañjātapakkho vā sakuṇo
anya-e0104n0:95_1: ḍetuṁ na sakkotīti pāḷiyaṁ “pakkhī sakuṇo”ti pakkhī-saddena visesetvā sakuṇo vuttoti
anya-e0104n0:95_2: “pakkhehi yuttasakuṇo”ti āha. Parikammaṁ katvāti “pathavī hotū”ti parikammaṁ katvā.
anya-e0104n0:96_0: Ākāse antalikkheti antalikkhasaññite ākāse. Yattha yattha hi āvaraṇaṁ natthi, taṁ
anya-e0104n0:96_1: taṁ “ākāsa”nti vuccati. Ayañca iddhimā na pathaviyā āsanne ākāse gacchati. Yattha
anya-e0104n0:96_2: pana pakkhīnaṁ agocaro, tattha gacchati, tādisañca loke “antalikkha”nti vuccati.
anya-e0104n0:97_0: Theroti pubbe vutta tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero. Samāpattisamāpajjananti puna samāpattisamāpajjanaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:97_1: Nanu samāhitamevassa cittanti iddhimato pāṭihāriyavasena pavattamānassa cittaṁ accantaṁ
anya-e0104n0:97_2: samāhitameva hoti, na aññadā viya asamāhitanti adhippāyo. Taṁ pana therassa matimattaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:97_3: Pubbe hi pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpajjitvā pathaviṁ adhiṭṭhāya gacchati, idāni pana ākāso
anya-e0104n0:97_4: icchitabbo, tasmā ākāsakasiṇaṁ samāpajjitabbameva. Tenāha “kiñcāpī”tiādi. Tirokuṭṭapāṭihāriyevuttanayeneva
anya-e0104n0:97_5: paṭipajjitabbanti yathā tattha kuṭṭādi “ākāso hotū”ti adhiṭṭhānena ākāso hoti, evaṁ
anya-e0104n0:97_6: idhāpi pabbatarukkhādiṁ adhiṭṭhānena ākāsaṁ katvā gantabbanti attho. Atha vā tirokuṭṭapāṭihāriye
anya-e0104n0:97_7: vuttanayenevāti “sace panassa bhikkhuno adhiṭṭhahitvā gacchantassā”tiādinā tattha
anya-e0104n0:97_8: vuttanayena. Etena “purimādhiṭṭhānabaleneva cassa antarā añño pabbato vā rukkho vā
anya-e0104n0:97_9: utumayo uṭṭhahissatīti aṭṭhānameveta”nti nāgādīhi kayiramāno vibandho gamanantarāyaṁ
anya-e0104n0:98: Okāseti janavivitte yuttaṭṭhāne. Pākaṭo hoti ākāsacārī ayaṁ samaṇoti.
anya-e0104n0:99_0: 396.Dvācattālīsayojanasahassaggahaṇaṁ paṭhamakappavasena kataṁ, tato paraṁ pana anukkamena
anya-e0104n0:99_1: pathaviyā ussitabhāvena tato katipayayojanūnatā siyā, appakaṁ adhikaṁ vā ūnaṁ vā
anya-e0104n0:99_2: gaṇanūpagaṁ na hotīti tathā vuttaṁ. Tīsu dīpesu ekakkhaṇe ālokakaraṇenāti yadā yasmiṁ
anya-e0104n0:99_3: dīpe majjhe tiṭṭhanti, tadā tato purimasmiṁ atthaṁ gacchantā pacchime udentā hutvā
anya-e0104n0:99_4: ālokakaraṇena. Aññajotīnaṁ vā abhibhavanena, duddasatāya ca mahiddhike. Sattānaṁ
anya-e0104n0:99_5: sītapariḷāhavūpasamanena, osadhitiṇavanappatīnaṁ paribrūhanena ca mahānubhāve. Chupatīti
anya-e0104n0:99_6: phusati. Parimajjatīti hatthaṁ ito cito ca sañcārento ghaṁseti. Abhiññāpādakajjhānavasenevāti
anya-e0104n0:99_7: yassa kassaci abhiññāpādakajjhānavasena. Eva-kārena pādakajjhānavisesaṁ nivatteti,
anya-e0104n0:99_9: viya imasmiṁ nāma kasiṇe jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti na ettha koci niyamo
anya-e0104n0:99_10: atthīti attho. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṁ kiñci samāpattiṁ aparāmasitvā “idha so iddhimā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:99_11: vuttaṁ. Hatthapāse hoti “candimasūriye”ti evaṁ vuttaṁ candimasūriyamaṇḍalaṁ. Rūpagataṁ
anya-e0104n0:99_12: hatthapāseti hatthapāse ṭhitaṁ rūpagataṁ, hatthapāse vā rūpagataṁ. Hatthaṁ vā vaḍḍhetvā
anya-e0104n0:100_0: Upādinnakaṁ nissāya anupādinnakassa vaḍḍhanaṁ vuttaṁ. Yuttiyā panettha upādinnakassapi
anya-e0104n0:100_1: vaḍḍhanacchāyā dissati. Attano aṇumahantabhāvāpādane upādinnakassa hāpanaṁ viya vaḍḍhanampi
anya-e0104n0:100_2: labbhateva. Yathā āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa nandopanandadamaneti evaṁ pavattaṁ sahavatthunā
anya-e0104n0:100_3: theravādaṁ āharitvā tamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero āhā”tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:100_4: Kiṁ pana na hoti, hotiyevāti adhippāyo. Dve hi paṭisedhā pakatiṁ gamentīti. “Tadā
anya-e0104n0:100_5: mahantaṁ hoti mahāmoggallānattherassa viyā”ti idaṁ yathādhikatatthadassanavasena
anya-e0104n0:102_0: Olokesi buddhāciṇṇavasena “atthi nu kho assa upanissayo”ti. Lokiyaṁ ratanattaye pasādalakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0104n0:102_1: sāsanāvatāraṁ sandhāyāha “appasanno”ti. Micchādiṭṭhito vivecetvā pasādetabboti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:103_0: Taṁ divasanti yadā bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tāvatiṁsabhavanābhimukho gacchati,
anya-e0104n0:103_1: taṁ divasabhāgaṁ. Āpānabhūmiṁ sajjayiṁsūti yattha so nisinno bhojanakiccaṁ karoti,
anya-e0104n0:103_2: taṁ parivesanaṭṭhānaṁ sittaṁ sammaṭṭhaṁ bhojanūpakaraṇūpanayanādinā sajjayiṁsu paṭiyādesuṁ.
anya-e0104n0:104_0: Uparūparīti matthakamatthake. Bhavanenāti bhavanapadesena. Bhogehīti sarīrabhogehi.
anya-e0104n0:104_1: Avakujjenāti nikujjitena. Gahetvāti yathā tāvatiṁsabhavanassa padesopi nāvasissati, evaṁ pariyādāya.
anya-e0104n0:105_0: Sineruparibhaṇḍanti sinerumekhalaṁ. Sinerussa kira samantato bahalato, puthulato
anya-e0104n0:105_1: ca pañcayojanasahassaparimāṇāni cattāri paribhaṇḍāni tāvatiṁsabhavanassa ārakkhāya
anya-e0104n0:105_2: nāgehi, garuḷehi, kumbhaṇḍehi, yakkhehi ca adhiṭṭhitāni, tāni paribhaṇḍabhāvasāmaññena
anya-e0104n0:105_3: ekajjhaṁ katvā “paribhaṇḍa”nti vuttaṁ. Tehi kira sinerussa upaḍḍhaṁ pariyādinnaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:106: Attabhāvaṁ vijahitvāti manussarūpaṁ antaradhāpetvā. Bādhatīti khedamattaṁ uppādeti.
anya-e0104n0:107_0: Attabhāvaṁ vijahitvāti sukhumattabhāvanimmānena nāgarūpaṁ vijahitvā. Mukhaṁ vivari
anya-e0104n0:107_1: “mukhagataṁ samaṇaṁ saṁkhādissāmī”ti. Pācīnena ca pacchimena cāti nāgassa tathānipannattā
anya-e0104n0:108: Āditopaṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihāriyānīti tadā therena katapāṭihāriyāni sandhāya vuttaṁ. Imaṁ pana ṭhānanti imaṁ nāsāvātavissajjanakāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:109: Anubandhīti “na sakkā evaṁmahiddhikassa imassa samaṇassa paṭipaharitu”nti bhayena palāyantaṁ anubandhi.
anya-e0104n0:110_0: Ekapaṭipāṭiyāti ekāya paṭipāṭiyā, nirantaranti attho. Ayamevāti yā upādinnakaṁ nissāya
anya-e0104n0:110_1: anupādinnakassa vaḍḍhi, ayameva. Ettha edise hatthavaḍḍhanādipāṭihāriye yutti yuttarūpā
anya-e0104n0:110_2: cittato, ututo vā upādinnakarūpānaṁ anuppajjanato. Atha vā upādinnanti sakalameva
anya-e0104n0:110_3: indriyabaddhaṁ adhippetaṁ. Evampi tassa tathā vaḍḍhi na yujjati evāti vuttanayeneva
anya-e0104n0:110_4: vaḍḍhi veditabbā. Ekasantāne upādinnaṁ, anupādinnañca sambhinnaṁ viya pavattamānampi
anya-e0104n0:110_5: atthato asambhinnameva. Tattha yathā āḷhakamatte khīre anekāḷhake udake āsitte yadipi
anya-e0104n0:110_6: khīraṁ sabbena sambhinnaṁ sabbatthakameva lambamānaṁ hutvā tiṭṭhati, tathāpi na tattha
anya-e0104n0:110_7: khīraṁ vaḍḍhati, udakameva vaḍḍhati, evamevaṁ yadipi upādinnaṁ anupādinnañca sambhinnaṁ
anya-e0104n0:110_8: viya pavattati, tathāpi upādinnaṁ na vaḍḍhati, iddhānubhāvena cittajaṁ, tadanusārena
anya-e0104n0:111_0: Soti so iddhimā. Evaṁ katvāti vuttākārena hatthaṁ vā vaḍḍhetvā te vā āgantvā hatthapāse
anya-e0104n0:111_1: ṭhite katvā. Pādaṭṭhapanādipi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ. Aparopi iddhimā. Tathevāti
anya-e0104n0:111_2: pāṭihāriyakaraṇato pubbe viya. Tathūpamametanti yathā udakapuṇṇāsu nānāpātīsu bahūhi
anya-e0104n0:111_3: nānācandamaṇḍalesu dissamānesu na tena candamaṇḍalassa gamanādiuparodho, bahūnañca
anya-e0104n0:111_4: paccekaṁ dassanaṁ ijjhati, tathūpamametaṁ pāṭihāriyaṁ candimasūriyānaṁ gamanādiuparodhābhāvato,
anya-e0104n0:111_5: bahūnañca iddhimantānaṁ tattha iddhipayogassa yathicchitaṁ samijjhanatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0104n0:112: 397.Paricchedaṁ katvāti abhividhivasena pana paricchedaṁ katvā, na mariyādavasena. Tathā hesa brahmaloke attano kāyena vasaṁ vatteti. Pāḷīti paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷi.
anya-e0104n0:113_0: Yāvabrahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vattetīti ettha yasmā na brahmalokasseva gamanaṁ adhippetaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:113_1: nāpi brahmalokassa gamanameva, atha kho aññathā aññampi. Yāva brahmalokāti pana dūrāvadhinidassanametaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:113_2: tasmā “sace brahmalokaṁ gantukāmā hotī”ti vatvāpi itarampi dassetuṁ “santikepi dūre
anya-e0104n0:113_3: adhiṭṭhātī”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha pi-saddo samuccayattho, tena vuttāvasesassa adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā
anya-e0104n0:113_4: nipphādetabbassa sabbassāpi saṅgaho, na vuttassevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:114: Yamakapāṭihāriyāvasānetiādinā tivikkamassa adhiṭṭhāniddhinipphannatā vuttā, aññattha pana lakkhaṇānisaṁsatā. Tadubhayaṁ yathā aññamaññaṁ na virujjhati, tathā vicāretvā gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:116: Mahābodhinti aparājitapallaṅkaṁ mahābodhiṁ. Citte uppanne santike akāsīti tathā cittuppattisamanantarameva pathaviṁ, samuddañca saṁkhipitvā mahābodhisantike akāsi.
anya-e0104n0:117: Nakkhattadivaseti mahadivase. Candapūveti candasadise candamaṇḍalākāre pūve. Ekapattapūramattamakāsīti yathā te pamāṇato sarūpeneva antopattapariyāpannā honti, tathā akāsi.
anya-e0104n0:118_0: Kākavaliyavatthusmiñca “bhagavā thokaṁ bahuṁ akāsī”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ. Taṁ
anya-e0104n0:118_1: pana vatthuṁ saṅkhepatova dassetuṁ “mahākassapatthero kirā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Samāpattiyāti nirodhasamāpattiyā.
anya-e0104n0:119: Gaṅgātīreti tambapaṇṇidīpe gaṅgānadiyā tīre. Saññaṁ adāsīti yathā te yathādhiṭṭhitaṁ sappiṁ passanti, tathā saññaṁ adāsi.
anya-e0104n0:120_0: Tassāti yassa brahmuno rūpaṁ daṭṭhukāmo, tassa brahmuno rūpaṁ passati. Saddaṁ suṇātīti
anya-e0104n0:120_1: dibbāya sotadhātuyā brahmuno saddaṁ suṇāti. Cittaṁ pajānātīti cetopariyañāṇena brahmuno
anya-e0104n0:120_2: cittaṁ pajānāti. Karajakāyassa vasenāti cātumahābhūtikarūpakāyassa vasena. “Cittaṁ
anya-e0104n0:120_3: pariṇāmetī”ti ettha kiṁ taṁ cittaṁ, kathaṁ vā pariṇāmananti āha “pādakajjhānacittaṁ
anya-e0104n0:120_4: gahetvā kāye āropetī”ti. Kathaṁ pana kāye āropetīti āha “kāyānugatikaṁ karotī”ti.
anya-e0104n0:120_5: Evampi saddadandharovāyanti vacanapathaṁ pacchindanto āha “dandhagamana”nti. Karotīti
anya-e0104n0:120_6: sambandho. Kāyagamanaṁ hi dandhaṁ, dandhamahābhūtapaccayattāti adhippāyo. Ayañhettha
anya-e0104n0:120_7: attho – dissamānena kāyena gantukāmatāya vasena cittaṁ pariṇāmento yogī pādakajjhānaṁ
anya-e0104n0:120_8: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “idaṁ cittaṁ kāyo viya dandhagamanaṁ hotū”ti parikammaṁ karoti.
anya-e0104n0:120_9: Tathā parikammakaraṇaṁ hi sandhāya “pādakajjhānacittaṁ gahetvā”ti vuttaṁ. Parikammaṁ
anya-e0104n0:120_10: pana katvā puna samāpajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahanto taṁ cittaṁ kāye āropeti, kāyānugatikaṁ
anya-e0104n0:121_0: Sukhasaññanti sukhasahagataṁ saññaṁ, saññāsīsena niddeso. Lahubhāvena saññātanti
anya-e0104n0:121_1: lahusaññaṁ. Kathaṁ pana iddhicittena saha sukhasaññāya sambhavoti āha “sukhasaññā
anya-e0104n0:121_2: nāma upekkhāsampayuttā saññā”ti. Sukhanti saññātanti vā sukhasaññaṁ. Tenevāha “upekkhā
anya-e0104n0:121_3: hi santaṁ sukhanti vuttā”ti ekantagarukehi nīvaraṇehi, oḷārikehi anupasantasabhāvehi
anya-e0104n0:121_4: ca vitakkādīhi vippayogo cittacetasikānaṁ lahubhāvassa kāraṇanti dassento āha “sāyeva…pe…
anya-e0104n0:121_5: veditabbā”ti. Taṁ okkantassāti taṁ sukhalahusaññaṁ anuppattassa. Assāti yogino. Gantukāmatā
anya-e0104n0:121_6: eva ettha pamāṇanti ettha etasmiṁ dissamānena kāyena gamane yaṁ ṭhānaṁ gantukāmo,
anya-e0104n0:121_7: taṁ uddissa gantukāmatāvasena pavattaparikammādhiṭṭhānāni eva pamāṇaṁ, tāvatā gamanaṁ
anya-e0104n0:121_8: ijjhati. Tasmā magganimmānavāyuadhiṭṭhānehi vināpi icchitadesappatti hotīti. Idāni
anya-e0104n0:122_0: Kāyaṁ gahetvāti karajakāyaṁ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena parikammacittena gahetvā. Citte
anya-e0104n0:122_1: āropetīti “ayaṁ kāyo idaṁ cittaṁ viya hotū”ti pādakajjhānacitte āropeti taggatikaṁ
anya-e0104n0:122_2: karoti. Tenāha “cittānugatikaṁ karoti sīghagamana”nti. Cittagamananti cittappavattimāha.
anya-e0104n0:122_3: Idaṁ pana cittavasena kāyapariṇāmanapāṭihāriyaṁ. Cittagamanamevāti cittena samānagamanameva.
anya-e0104n0:122_4: Kathaṁ pana kāyo dandhappavattiko lahuparivattinā cittena samānagatiko hotīti? Na
anya-e0104n0:122_5: sabbathā samānagatiko. Yatheva hi kāyavasena cittapariṇāmane cittaṁ sabbathā kāyena
anya-e0104n0:122_6: samānagatikaṁ na hoti. Na hi tadā cittaṁ sabhāvasiddhena attano khaṇena avattitvā
anya-e0104n0:122_7: garuvuttikassa rūpadhammassa khaṇena vattati. “Idaṁ cittaṁ ayaṁ kāyo viya hotū”ti
anya-e0104n0:122_8: pana adhiṭṭhānena dandhagatikassa kāyassa anuvattanato yāva icchitaṭṭhānappatti,
anya-e0104n0:122_9: tāva kāyagatianulomeneva hutvā santānavasena pavattamānaṁ cittaṁ kāyagatiyā pariṇāmitaṁ
anya-e0104n0:122_10: nāma hoti, evaṁ “ayaṁ kāyo idaṁ cittaṁ viya hotū”ti adhiṭṭhānena pageva sukhalahusaññāya
anya-e0104n0:122_11: sampāditattā abhāvitiddhipādānaṁ viya dandhaṁ avattitvā yathā lahukatipayacittavāreheva
anya-e0104n0:122_12: icchitaṭṭhānappatti hoti, evaṁ pavattamāno kāyo cittagatiyā pariṇāmito nāma hoti,
anya-e0104n0:123_0: Evañca katvā “seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya, pasāritaṁ
anya-e0104n0:123_1: vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyyā”ti idampi upamāvacanaṁ nippariyāyeneva samatthitaṁ hoti. Avassaṁ
anya-e0104n0:123_2: cetaṁ evaṁ sampaṭicchitabbaṁ, aññathā suttābhidhammapāṭhehi, vinayaaṭṭhakathāya ca
anya-e0104n0:123_3: virodho siyā, dhammatā ca vilomitā. “Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave, aññaṁ ekadhammampī”ti hi ettha
anya-e0104n0:123_4: aññagahaṇena rūpadhammā gahitā alahuparivattitāya. Abhidhamme ca purejātapaccayo
anya-e0104n0:123_5: rūpameva vutto, pacchājātapaccayo ca tasseva. Yattha yattha ca dhammā uppajjanti,
anya-e0104n0:123_6: tattha tattheva bhijjanti. Natthi desantarasaṅkamanaṁ, na ca sabhāvo aññathā hotīti.
anya-e0104n0:123_7: Na hi iddhibalena dhammānaṁ kenaci lakkhaṇaṁ aññathattaṁ kātuṁ sakkā, bhāvaññathattameva
anya-e0104n0:123_8: pana kātuṁ sakkā. “Tīsupi khaṇesū”ti idampi gamanārambhaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ, na gamananiṭṭhānanti
anya-e0104n0:123_9: vadanti. Theroti aṭṭhakathācariyānaṁ antare eko thero. Idhāti idaṁ pāṭihāriyaṁ vibhajitvā
anya-e0104n0:123_10: vuttapāṭhe. Sayaṁ gamanameva āgataṁ “brahmalokaṁ gacchatī”ti vuttattā.
anya-e0104n0:124_0: Cakkhusotādīnanti cakkhusotādīnaṁ aṅgānaṁ. Tathā hi vuttaṁ “sabbaṅgapaccaṅga”nti,
anya-e0104n0:124_1: sabbaaṅgapaccaṅgavantanti attho. Pasādo nāma natthīti imināva bhāvajīvitindriyānampi
anya-e0104n0:124_2: abhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Rucivasenāti icchāvasena. Aññampīti bhagavatā kariyamānato
anya-e0104n0:124_3: aññampi kiriyaṁ karoti. Ayañcettha buddhānubhāvo. Yadi sāvakanimmitesu nānappakāratā
anya-e0104n0:124_4: natthi, “sace pana nānāvaṇṇe kātukāmo hotī”tiādi yaṁ heṭṭhā vuttaṁ, taṁ kathanti?
anya-e0104n0:124_5: Taṁ tathā tathā parikammaṁ katvā adhiṭṭhahantassa te te vaṇṇavayādivisesā parikammānurūpaṁ
anya-e0104n0:124_6: ijjhantīti katvā vuttaṁ. Idha pana yathādhiṭṭhite nimmitarūpe sace sāvako “ime visesā
anya-e0104n0:124_7: hontū”ti icchati, na ijjhati, buddhānaṁ pana ijjhatīti ayamattho dassitoti na koci virodho.
anya-e0104n0:125_0: Idāni yāni tāni “yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vattetī”ti pāḷiyā atthadassanavasena
anya-e0104n0:125_1: vibhattāni “dūrepi santike adhiṭṭhātī”tiādīni cuddasa pāṭihāriyāni, tattha sikhāppattaṁ
anya-e0104n0:125_2: kāyena vasavattanapāṭihāriyaṁ dassetuṁ “ettha cā”tiādi āraddhaṁ. Tattha yanti kiriyāparāmasanaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:125_3: tena “rūpaṁ passatī”ti ettha yadetaṁ rūpadassanaṁ, “saddaṁ suṇātī”ti ettha yadetaṁ
anya-e0104n0:125_4: saddasavanaṁ, “cittaṁ pajānātī”ti ettha yadetaṁ cittajānananti evaṁ dibbacakkhusotacetopariyañāṇakattukaṁ
anya-e0104n0:125_5: dassanasavanajānanakiriyaṁ parāmasatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Ito paresu santiṭṭhatītiādīsupi
anya-e0104n0:125_6: eseva nayo. Yampissāti yampi assa. Yogino adhiṭṭhānanti sambandho. Yañca khoti ettha
anya-e0104n0:125_7: kho-saddo avadhāraṇattho, visesattho vā, tena ayamevettha kāyena vasavattanapāṭihāriyesu
anya-e0104n0:125_8: ukkaṭṭhataranti dīpeti. Kasmā? “Ayaṁ nu kho iddhimā, ayaṁ nu kho nimmito”ti ekaccassa
anya-e0104n0:125_9: brahmuno āsaṅkuppādanato. Yadaggena cetaṁ adhiṭṭhitaṁ visesato manomayanti vuccati,
anya-e0104n0:125_10: tadaggena ukkaṭṭhataranti veditabbaṁ. Tenāha “ettāvatā kāyena vasaṁ vatteti nāmā”ti.
anya-e0104n0:125_11: Yadi evaṁ kasmā idha sesāni gahitānīti āha “sesaṁ…pe… vutta”nti.
anya-e0104n0:126_0: 398.Idaṁ nānākaraṇanti kāmamimāpi dve iddhiyo adhiṭṭhānavaseneva ijjhanti, tathāpi
anya-e0104n0:126_1: idaṁ idāni vuccamānaṁ imāsaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ viseso. Pakativaṇṇaṁ vijahitvāti attano
anya-e0104n0:126_2: pakatirūpaṁ vijahitvā apanetvā, paresaṁ adassetvāti attho. Kumārakavaṇṇanti kumārakasaṇṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:126_3: Dassetīti tathā vikubbanto attani dasseti. Nāgavaṇṇaṁ vātiādīsupi eseva nayo. Hatthimpi
anya-e0104n0:126_4: dassetīti attānampi hatthiṁ katvā dasseti, bahiddhāpi hatthiṁ dasseti. Etadatthameva
anya-e0104n0:126_5: hi idha “hatthivaṇṇaṁ vā dassetī”ti avatvā “hatthimpi dassetī”ti vuttaṁ. Yaṁ pana
anya-e0104n0:126_6: keci bahiddhā hatthiādidassanavacanaṁ “pakativaṇṇaṁ vijahitvā”ti vacanena vikubbaniddhibhāvena
anya-e0104n0:126_7: virujjhatīti vadanti, tadayuttaṁ. Kasmā? Pakativaṇṇavijahanaṁ nāma attano pakatirūpassa
anya-e0104n0:126_8: aññesaṁ adassanaṁ, na sabbena sabbaṁ tassa nirodhanaṁ. Evaṁ sati attānaṁ adassetvā
anya-e0104n0:126_9: bahiddhā hatthiṁ dassento “pakativaṇṇaṁ vijahitvā hatthiṁ dassetī”ti vuccamāne ko
anya-e0104n0:126_10: ettha virodho, attanā pana hatthivaṇṇo hutvā bahiddhāpi hatthiṁ dassante vattabbameva
anya-e0104n0:126_11: natthi. Tenevāha “bahiddhāpi hatthiādidassanavasena vutta”nti. Evañca katvā vikubbaniddhibhāvena ca na koci virodho.
anya-e0104n0:127_0: Pāḷiyañca kumārakavaṇṇaṁ vātiādīsu aniyamattho vā-saddo vutto. Tesu ekekasseva karaṇadassanatthaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:127_1: Hatthimpītiādīsu pana hatthiādīnaṁ bahūnaṁ ekajjhaṁ kātabbābhāvadassanatthaṁ samuccayattho
anya-e0104n0:127_2: pi-saddo vutto. Tena “hatthimpi dassetī”tiādīsu dutiye vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0104n0:128_0: Iddhimato attano kumārakākārena paresaṁ dassanaṁ kumārakavaṇṇanimmānaṁ, na ettha
anya-e0104n0:128_1: kiñci apubbaṁ pathavīādivatthu nipphādīyatīti kasiṇaniyamena payojanābhāvato “pathavīkasiṇādīsu
anya-e0104n0:128_2: aññatarārammaṇato”ti vuttaṁ. Satipi vā vatthunipphādane yathārahaṁ taṁ pathavīkasiṇādivaseneva
anya-e0104n0:128_3: ijjhatīti evampettha kasiṇaniyamena payojanaṁ nattheva. Kumārakavaṇṇañhi dassentena
anya-e0104n0:128_4: nīlavaṇṇaṁ vā dassetabbaṁ siyā, pītādīsu aññataravaṇṇaṁ vā. Tathā sati nīlādikasiṇāni
anya-e0104n0:128_5: samāpajjitabbānīti āpannova kasiṇaniyamo. Eseva nayo sesesupi. Evamadhiṭṭhite yadeke
anya-e0104n0:128_6: pathavīkasiṇavasena “ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”tiādi bhāvoti evaṁ pavattena kasiṇaniddesena
anya-e0104n0:128_8: āsaṅkanti, so anokāsovāti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Nimminitabbabhāvena attanā icchitoti attano
anya-e0104n0:128_9: kumārakavaṇṇo, na pana attano daharakāle kumārakavaṇṇoti. Nāgādivaṇṇesupi ayaṁ nayo
anya-e0104n0:128_10: byāpī evāti yadeke “nāgādinimmāne na yujjati viyā”ti vadanti, tadapohataṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0104n0:129_0: Bahiddhāpīti pi-saddena ajjhattaṁ sampiṇḍeti. Ayañhettha attho – hatthimpi dassetītiādi
anya-e0104n0:129_1: ajjhattaṁ, bahiddhāpi hatthiādidassanavasena vuttaṁ, na “kumārakavaṇṇaṁ vā”tiādi
anya-e0104n0:129_2: viya ajjhattameva kumārakavaṇṇādīnaṁ dassanavasenāti. Yaṁ ettha vattabbaṁ adhiṭṭhānavidhānaṁ,
anya-e0104n0:130_0: 399.Kāyanti attano karajakāyaṁ. Vuttanayenevāti “ayaṁ kāyo susiro hotū”ti parikammaṁ
anya-e0104n0:130_1: katvā puna “pādakajjhānaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāyā”ti imaṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusāramāha.
anya-e0104n0:130_2: Aññaṁ kāyanti yaṁ manomayaṁ kāyaṁ nimminitukāmo, taṁ. Muñjamhāti muñjatiṇato. Īsikanti
anya-e0104n0:130_3: tassa kaṇḍaṁ. Kosiyāti asikosato. Karaṇḍāyāti peḷāya, nimmokatoti ca vadanti. Abbāhatīti
